articles.description: The 2021 Audi A4 facelift is the car with which Audi India kicks off the New Year. It is the car which shaped the brand identity for the company in India. But how much does it improve over its predecessor? We spend some time with the car and find out.
articles.content: 2020 was a tricky year but Audi did well to roll out a slew of launches which included the Q8, RSQ8, RS7 Sportback, A8L and its last launch was the Q2, which serves as the entry-point for customers b… [+6473 chars]
